content:
Middle of the Map Fest is a fantastic event! It's a music, film, and forum festival held annually in Kansas City, Missouri. I'd be happy to help you with the schedule and ticket prices.

**Schedule:**
The festival typically takes place over three days in April, but exact dates may vary from year to year. The event features a mix of music performances, film screenings, and forum discussions. The music lineup includes local, regional, and national acts, covering various genres such as indie rock, hip-hop, electronic, and more.

The festival schedule usually includes:

1. Music performances: Multiple stages with live music acts, often from 2 pm to 1 am.
2. Film screenings: A selection of films, documentaries, and shorts, showcased at various venues.
3. Forum discussions: Panels, workshops, and Q&A sessions with industry professionals, artists, and thought leaders.

**Ticket Prices:**
Ticket prices may vary depending on the festival year and package deals. Here's a general idea of what you can expect:

1. Single-Day Passes: Around $30-$40 per day, granting access to music performances and film screenings.
2. Three-Day Passes: Approximately $60-$80, providing access to all music and film events across the three days.
3. VIP Passes: Around $150-$200, offering perks like priority entry, exclusive access to VIP-only events, and more.
4. Film-Only Passes: Usually around $10-$20, allowing access to film screenings only.

Please note that prices may change, and special deals or bundle packages might be available. I recommend checking the official Middle of the Map Fest website or social media channels for the most up-to-date information on schedules and ticket prices.

**Additional Tips:**

* The festival often offers a free mobile app to help you plan your schedule and stay updated on any last-minute changes.
* Food and drink vendors will be available throughout the festival, but you can also explore the local restaurants and bars in the surrounding area.
* Be sure to check the festival's website for any specific rules or restrictions on items you can bring into the venues.

I hope this helps, and I'm sure you'll have an amazing time at Middle of the Map Fest!
